name: smart-energy-copilot
description: AI-powered IoT system for optimizing energy consumption

scripts.desktop:start: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js start
scripts.desktop:cli: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js cli
scripts.desktop:service: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js start --mode service
scripts.desktop:api: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js start --mode api
scripts.desktop:status: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js status
scripts.desktop:install: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js install
scripts.desktop:config: npm run build && node dist/desktop/main.js config init
scripts.t5:install: npm run build && npm run t5:setup && npm run t5:start
